user_prompt: Create Banking Website using Azure Infrastructure and provide proper security layers throughout the application

epics.title: Azure Infrastructure Setup for Banking Website
epics.summary: Set up foundational Azure infrastructure components for the banking website.
epics.description: This epic involves setting up the core Azure infrastructure required to host and manage the banking website. It includes provisioning Azure Resource Groups, App Services, Virtual Networks, Load Balancers, and managing configuration through Infrastructure as Code using tools like Azure Bicep or Terraform. Proper environment segregation (Dev, QA, Prod) should be established, along with monitoring and cost management configurations.

epics.title: Database and Storage Configuration
epics.summary: Configure secure database and storage solutions for banking data.
epics.description: This epic focuses on the database architecture and storage layer configuration for securely managing customer and transactional data. It includes setting up Azure SQL Database or PostgreSQL with encryption, backup policies, failover setup, and Azure Blob Storage with appropriate access controls. Role-based access, data masking, and compliance with PCI-DSS and GDPR should be implemented to ensure data security.

epics.title: Application Backend Development
epics.summary: Develop core backend services for banking operations.
epics.description: This epic covers the design and development of backend APIs to support customer registration, authentication, account management, transactions, and reporting. The services will be developed using a secure and scalable framework (such as .NET Core or Node.js) and deployed on Azure App Services or Azure Kubernetes Service. It must incorporate secure APIs with token-based authentication and input validation.

epics.title: Frontend UI Development
epics.summary: Build user interface for bank customers and administrators.
epics.description: This epic involves designing and developing responsive web interfaces for different user roles, including retail customers, administrators, and auditors. The frontend should be developed using modern frameworks such as React or Angular, integrate seamlessly with backend APIs, and ensure adherence to accessibility, usability, and security best practices.

epics.title: Security Implementation and Compliance
epics.summary: Implement robust security layers and compliance for the banking platform.
epics.description: This epic covers the deployment of multiple security layers across the application and infrastructure. It includes Azure Security Center setup, network security groups, firewalls, encryption protocols (TLS 1.3), application gateway with WAF, and DDoS protection. Additionally, it ensures compliance with regulatory frameworks like PCI-DSS, ISO 27001, and GDPR. Security monitoring, auditing, and incident response procedures will be established for continuous protection.

epics.title: User Authentication and Authorization
epics.summary: Establish secure access control mechanisms for users and admins.
epics.description: This epic ensures robust authentication and authorization flows across the application. It includes integration with Azure Active Directory B2C for customer identity management, Multi-Factor Authentication (MFA), OAuth2 and OpenID Connect implementation, and session management with secure token handling. The system must maintain detailed access logs and role-based permissions in line with banking compliance requirements.

epics.title: Monitoring, Logging, and Incident Response
epics.summary: Implement monitoring, logging, and alerts across the Azure banking environment.
epics.description: This epic focuses on establishing proactive monitoring and incident response mechanisms. It includes configuring Azure Monitor, Application Insights, and Log Analytics for metric tracking and centralized log management. Automated alerts will be configured for performance degradation, security breaches, or anomalies. An incident response plan and reporting workflow will be documented to ensure rapid recovery and compliance.

epics.title: Performance Optimization and Scalability
epics.summary: Optimize performance and enable scalability for peak banking operations.
epics.description: This epic includes optimizing application performance, database queries, caching, and load distribution. Azure Autoscale and Content Delivery Networks (CDNs) will be configured to ensure smooth scaling under varying load conditions. Regular load tests and stress tests will be conducted, and tuning recommendations will be implemented to guarantee consistent uptime and user experience.

epics.title: Disaster Recovery and Backup Strategy
epics.summary: Implement backup and disaster recovery solutions for banking infrastructure.
epics.description: This epic ensures data integrity and business continuity through comprehensive backup and recovery strategies. It includes configuring Azure Backup, Azure Site Recovery, geo-redundant storage, and replication strategies for databases and application services. Regular disaster recovery (DR) drills will be performed to validate recovery objectives (RPO/RTO) and maintain compliance with financial regulations.
